segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing, it's just so disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing all over the place, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying her dishes, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're just making it worse, climbing up on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That little boy is standing on a tipping stool, reaching for cookies, it's just so reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how careless everyone is being in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting all wet and slippery, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids need to be more careful, climbing up like that, it's just so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like no one here has any respect for their own safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I would never let my kitchen get into a state like this, it's just so gross.
segments.speaker: PAR
